member.name: T:WindowsControlLibrary1.Core.Scrollbar
member.summary: CoreScrollbar is a custom scrollbar class that is fully drawn.

member.name: P:WindowsControlLibrary1.Core.Scrollbar.LargeChange
member.summary: The change in the position of the thumb when the user clicks in the scroll bar area or uses the pgup/pgdn.

member.name: P:WindowsControlLibrary1.Core.Scrollbar.Maximum
member.summary: The maximum position of the thumb.

member.name: P:WindowsControlLibrary1.Core.Scrollbar.Minimum
member.summary: The minimum position of the thumb.

member.name: P:WindowsControlLibrary1.Core.Scrollbar.SmallChange
member.summary: The change in the position of the thumb when the user clicks one of the arrows or uses an arrow key.

member.name: P:WindowsControlLibrary1.Core.Scrollbar.Value
member.summary: The position of the thumb.

member.name: P:WindowsControlLibrary1.Core.Scrollbar.Orientation
member.summary: The orientation of the scrollbar vertical/horizontal.

member.name: T:WindowsControlLibrary1.Core.Scrollbar.OrientationMode
member.summary: An enumeration of scrollbar orientation horizontal/vertical.

member.name: T:WindowsControlLibrary1.Core.Scrollbar.ControlEvents
member.summary: An enumeration of usercontrol events.

member.summary: Method for redrawing the scrollbar control.
